module.name: TTLoad
module.short: TrueType Table loaders used in the FreeType library.

descr.p: Copyright 1996 David Turner, Robert Wilhelm and Werner Lemberg.

This file is part of the FreeType project, and may only be used modified and distributed under the terms of the FreeType project license, LICENSE.TXT. By continuing to use, modify or distribute this file you indicate that you have read the license and understand and accept it fully.

ul.li: Changed the load model to get in touch with TTFile 1.1
Now loads one whole resident table in one call

element.name: LookUp_TrueType_Table
element.short: Looks for a TrueType table by name.

element.name: LookUp_TrueType_Table.Result
element.short: Index of the table if found, -1 otherwise.

element.name: LookUp_TrueType_Table.face
element.short: Resident table to look for.

element.name: LookUp_TrueType_Table.aTag
element.short: Searched tag.

descr.remark: Please notes: A table directory doesn't own subttables. There is no constructor or destructor for it.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Directory.Result
element.short: True on success, or False on failure.

descr.remark: Please notes : A maximum profile is a static table that owns no subttable. It has then no constructor nor destructor.

element.name: Load_TrueType_MaxProfile.Result
element.short: True on success, or False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Header
element.short: Load the TrueType header table in the resident table.

descr.remark: A font header is a static table that owns no subttable. It has neither a constructor nor a destructor.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Header.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Header.face
element.short: Current leading segment.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Locations
element.short: Loads the location table in resident table.

descr.remark: The Font Header must be loaded in the leading segment before calling this function. This table is destroyed directly by the resident destructor.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Locations.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Locations.face
element.short: Current Resident Leading Segment.

descr.remark: Please note : This attribute table is destroyed by the resident destructor.

element.name: Load_TrueType_CVT.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

descr.remark: The Cmap table directory is destroyed by the resident destructor. The Cmap subtables must be destroyed by Free_CMap_Table.

element.name: Load_TrueType_CMap.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Names
element.short: Loads the name table into the face table.

descr.remark: This attribute table is destroyed by the resident destructor.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Names.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Programs
element.short: Load the Font and CVT programs in the resident table.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Programs.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Postscript
element.short: Loads the Postscript table.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Postscript.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_OS2
element.short: Load the OS/2 Table.

element.name: Load_TrueType_OS2.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_HDMX
element.short: Load the 'hdmx' tables.

element.name: Load_TrueType_HDMX.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Metrics_Header.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Metrics_Header.face
element.short: When True, try to load the vertical header.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Any
element.short: Load any TrueType table in user memory.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Any.Result
element.short: True on success, False on failure.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Any.face
element.short: The face object for the font file.

element.name: Load_TrueType_Any.tag
element.short: The table.
